title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Exhibits
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Exhibits               Exhibits       Stories on El Camino Real de los Tejas cover how the trail served as a line of defense for New Spain; how American Indian lifeways changed forever; how shifting routes developed to meet the needs of travelers; and how the trail represented dramatic socioeconomic change in the 1800s. Visit this page often to view exhibits that tell the stories through time. Stephen F. Austin State University - Planting History         The exhibits can be viewed using Adobe Acrobat Reader. To download this free program, click here. If you have a slow Internet connection, it may take a few minutes to access the files.
